commits.content:
<?php

use Illuminate\Http\Request;

/*
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------
| API Routes
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------
|
| Here is where you can register API routes for your application. These
| routes are loaded by the RouteServiceProvider within a group which
| is assigned the "api" middleware group. Enjoy building your API!
|
*/

/*Route::middleware('auth:api')->get('/user', function (Request $request) {
    return $request->user();
});*/

Route::group(['namespace' => 'Api\V1', 'prefix' => 'v1', 'as' => 'v1.'], function () {
    Route::group(['prefix' => 'auth', 'middleware' => ['guest']], function () {
        Route::post('register', 'AuthController@register');
        Route::post('login', 'AuthController@login');
        Route::post('verifyOtp', 'AuthController@verifyOtp');
        Route::post('forgotPassword', 'AuthController@forgotPassword');
        Route::post('resendOtp', 'AuthController@resendOtp');
        Route::post('socialLogin', 'AuthController@socialLogin');
        // Password Reset
        Route::post('password/email', 'ForgotPasswordController@sendResetLinkEmail');
    });

    Route::group(['prefix' => 'driver', 'middleware' => ['guest']], function () {
        Route::post('register', 'DriverController@register');
        Route::post('login', 'DriverController@login');
        Route::post('verifyOtp', 'AuthController@verifyOtp');
        Route::post('forgotPassword', 'DriverController@forgotPassword');
        Route::post('resendOtp', 'DriverController@resendOtp');
        // Password Reset
        Route::post('password/email', 'ForgotPasswordController@sendResetLinkEmail');

       
        
    });

    Route::group(['prefix' => 'restaurant', 'middleware' => ['guest']], function () {
        Route::post('register', 'RestaurantController@register');
        Route::post('login', 'RestaurantController@login');
        Route::post('verifyOtp', 'AuthController@verifyOtp');
        Route::post('forgotPassword', 'RestaurantController@forgotPassword');
        Route::post('resendOtp', 'RestaurantController@resendOtp');
        // Password Reset
        Route::post('password/email', 'ForgotPasswordController@sendResetLinkEmail');
        
    });

    Route::group(['middleware' => ['auth:api']], function () {
        Route::group(['prefix' => 'auth'], function () {
            Route::post('logout', 'AuthController@logout');
            
            Route::get('getProfile', 'AuthController@me');
            Route::post('userProfile', 'AuthController@userProfile');
            Route::post('changePassword', 'AuthController@changePassword')->name('changePassword');
            
            Route::get('countries', 'AuthController@getCountries');
            Route::post('state', 'AuthController@getStates');
            Route::post('updateProfile', 'AuthController@updateProfile');
            Route::post('addAddress', 'AuthController@addAddress');
            Route::post('updateAddress', 'AuthController@updateAddress');
            Route::post('address-list', 'AuthController@addressList');
            Route::post('user-order-list', 'AuthController@orderList');
            Route::post('user-order-detail', 'AuthController@orderDetail');
            Route::get('notification', 'AuthController@notification');
            Route::post('cart', 'FoodDeliveryController@addItemInCart');
            Route::post('place-order', 'FoodDeliveryController@placeOrder');
            Route::post('order-list', 'FoodDeliveryController@orderList');
            Route::post('order-status', 'FoodDeliveryController@orderAccepAndReject');
            Route::post('notifications', 'FoodDeliveryController@notifications');
            Route::post('offer-verified', 'FoodDeliveryController@offerVerified');
           
        });
        
         /**************** DRIVER API ****************************/
        Route::group(['prefix' => 'driver'], function () {
            Route::post('loginLogs', 'DriverController@loginLogs');
            Route::get('getProfile', 'DriverController@me');
            Route::post('driver-order-accept', 'DriverController@driverAcceptOrder');
            Route::post('order-list', 'DriverController@orderList');
            Route::post('order-otp', 'DriverController@orderOtp');
            Route::post('dashboard', 'DriverController@dashboard');
            Route::post('transaction', 'DriverController@transaction');
            Route::post('revenue', 'DriverController@revenue');
        });

          /**************** RESTAURANT API ****************************/
          Route::group(['prefix' => 'restaurant'], function () {
            Route::post('loginLogs', 'RestaurantController@loginLogs');
            Route::get('getProfile', 'RestaurantController@me');
            Route::post('get-order-list', 'RestaurantController@restaurantOrderList');
            Route::post('dashboard', 'RestaurantController@dashboard');
            Route::post('restaurant-onoff', 'RestaurantController@restaurantOnOff');
            Route::post('order-detail', 'RestaurantController@orderDetail');
            Route::post('order-accept-reject', 'RestaurantController@orderAcceptAndReject');
            Route::post('categories', 'RestaurantController@categories');
            Route::post('sub-categories', 'RestaurantController@subCategories');
            Route::post('menu-onoff', 'RestaurantController@menuOnOff');
            Route::post('order-prepare', 'RestaurantController@orderPrepared');
            Route::post('driver-otp-verify', 'RestaurantController@driverOtpVerify');
            Route::post('revenue', 'RestaurantController@revenue');
            Route::post('past-order-cancel-order', 'RestaurantController@pastOrderCancelOrder');
            Route::post('transaction', 'RestaurantController@transaction');
        });
        
        
        //cmsPage
        Route::post('cmsPage', 'MlmController@cmsPage');

        
    });

    Route::post('notification-test', 'FoodDeliveryController@notificationTest');

    Route::post('dashboard', 'FoodDeliveryController@dashboard');

    Route::post('search', 'FoodDeliveryController@searchRestaurantAndCategory');

    Route::post('restaurant-detail', 'FoodDeliveryController@getRestaurantDetail');
    
    Route::post('offer-list', 'FoodDeliveryController@offerList');

    // Page
    Route::post('cmsPage', 'AuthController@cmsPage');

    // Faqs
    Route::apiResource('faqs', 'FaqsController');

    // Blog Categories
    Route::apiResource('blog-categories', 'BlogCategoriesController');

    // Blog Tags
    Route::apiResource('blog-tags', 'BlogTagsController');

    // Blogs
    Route::apiResource('blogs', 'BlogsController');

    // Blogs
    Route::apiResource('privacy-policy', 'AuthController@privacyPolicy');
});
